item.description: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ Tom Cruise hangs off airplanes at 30,000 feet. He's jumped out of helicopters, scaled the Burj Khalifa, and broken bones doing his own stunts because he thinks safety doubles are for cowards. This man just fled London because the streets feel too dangerous. When the most reckless actor in Hollywood history thinks your city is too sketchy, your city has a serious problem...

item.title: @elonmusk: The implementation of the first phase of Dubai Loop project will commence with the construction of a...
item.description: The implementation of the first phase of Dubai Loop project will commence with the construction of a 6.4km pilot route, comprising four stations and linking the Dubai International Financial Centre and Dubai Mall. This phase will pave the way for expansion into the full project alignment, which will extend up to 22.2 km and include 19 stations, connecting Dubai World Trade Centre and the financial district with Business Bay. Dubai Loop project involves the construction of tunnels with a diameter of 3.6 metres, dedicated to vehicle transport. The tunnels will be developed using advanced tunnelling technologies that enable faster delivery, lower construction costs, and reduced impact on existing roads and utilities compared with conventional transport systems.

item.description: JUST IN: The Tongva tribe â€” whose ancestral land Billie Eilish's multi-million-dollar Los Angeles mansion sits on â€” confirmed she has not contacted them about returning the â€œstolen land.â€ A spokesperson for the Tongva tribe told The Daily Mail: â€œâ€˜As the First People of the greater Los Angeles basin, we do understand that her home is situated in our ancestral land,â€™ they stated, adding that the A-lister has not reached out to the tribe herself.â€ â€œâ€˜Eilish has not contacted our tribe directly regarding her property, we do value the instance when Public Figures provide visibility to the true history of this country,â€™ the spokesperson continued.â€
